channel.title: Ascaria - 2006 Economy Based Server - HIRING WEB DEVELOPERS!
channel.description:
[CENTER]Hello,
My name is Jon, and I am the owner of Ascaria. Ascaria started recently and is based off of 2006Memory's Source. Ascaria is a 2006 economy based server with many unique features.
[B]This is not a remake, as remakes always tend to die. We expect Ascaria to last for time to come![/B]
To look at our source that we used, click [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/485570-2006scape-advanced-2006memorys.html"]here[/URL].
There are some requirements for joining the team:
[B][I][U]Web Developer:[/U][/I][/B] [I]Currently looking for [B]one[/B] Web Developer[/I]
[ul][*]Portfolio (Showing your experience) [*]Active 3+ days a week (I understand real life situations which is why being on daily isn't a requirement) [*]Maturity[/ul]
[B][U]Current Staff Team[/U][/B] [I]Server Owner:[/I] Mod Jon [I]Content Developers:[/I] Mod Four, Mod Dom, Mod Austin, and Mod Sean
If you meet these requirements for a Quest/Content Developer or Web Developer, please contact "jon.niemiec" on Skype, or comment your Skype name and I will add you.
With regards, Mod Jon of Ascaria[/CENTER]

item.title: Ascaria - 2006 Economy Based Server - HIRING WEB DEVELOPERS!
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

i don’t have maturity but i do have 10 yrs java experience, am i still eligible?

Read full topic

item.title: Ascaria - 2006 Economy Based Server - HIRING WEB DEVELOPERS!

item.description:
@Monthly1 wrote:

Hey its STRAWBERRY Jon ;D
Would love to join the team! But i’m more of a management person
But can’t wait till this comes out in beta! Goodluck to anyone who joins!

@Ascaria wrote:

[CENTER]Hello,

My name is Jon, and I am the owner of Ascaria. Ascaria started recently and is based off of 2006Memory’s Source. Ascaria is a 2006 economy based server with many unique features.

[B]This is not a remake, as remakes always tend to die. We expect Ascaria to last for time to come![/B]

To look at our source that we used, click [URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/485570-2006scape-advanced-2006memorys.html”]here[/URL].

There are some requirements for joining the team:

[B][I][U]Web Developer:[/U][/I][/B]

[ul][]Portfolio (Showing your experience)
[]Active 3+ days a week (I understand real life situations which is why being on daily isn’t a requirement)

If you meet these requirements for a Quest/Content Developer or Web Developer, please contact “jon.niemiec” on Skype, or comment your Skype name and I will add you.

With regards,
Mod Jon of Ascaria[/CENTER]
